description: Update a material purchase order release redemption.
permissions: User must be an admin or a member of the broker or material supplier associated with the redemption.
side_effects: Updates a material purchase order release redemption.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (release redemption ID). At least one field must be provided for update. --material-transaction can be set to an empty value to clear it. The redemption must still have either a ticket number or a material transaction after update. If both are present, the ticket number must match the material transaction ticket number. The material transaction must match the release material type family, material supplier, and material site.

flags.name: --material-transaction
flags.description: Material transaction ID (empty to clear). Example: --material-transaction 456
flags.validation: Set empty to clear the material transaction relationship.
